## Ingredients:

*Serves 2-3 people*

-   2 tsp cumin seeds
-   1/2 tsp coriander seeds
-   2 tsp smoked paprika
-   1 small onion, diced
-   1 tsp garlic, minced
-   2 cans black beans, rinsed and drained
